description: Try our easy to follow Thai Sweet Potato, Coconut & Chicken Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sweet potato,Egg free,Winter,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Thai Sweet Potato, Coconut & Chicken Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g sweet potato, peeled, halved, thickly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add shallot and garlic and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes. Add sweet potato, galangal, lemongrass, lime leaves, coconut milk and stock. Increase heat to bring to the boil, then reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes.

Meanwhile, slice chicken into strips. Add to soup with chilli, fish sauce and lime juice. Simmer for 5 minutes, add snow peas and cook for a further 3 minutes. Remove galangal, lime leaves and lemongrass. Ladle into bowls and garnish with coriander.
